response.overview: A family with three children lives within the dark walls of an apartment. The mother does everything possible to care for her children and protect them from an essential, latent evil: an abusive power relationship that, like a hereditary disease, continues to plague her and so many others. But breaking the cycle isn't easy, and every failed attempt is a lost opportunity. From Jerez comes a harsh and furious fable.
response.title: Quejío de loba
